snippet: A study says that the breast cancer drug tamoxifen should be taken for 10 years rather than for the customary five years to help reduce the risk of death.
abstract: Study published in The Lancet suggests that women should be taking widely prescribed breast cancer drug tamoxifen for 10 years rather than for the customary 5 years to help reduce risk of death.
lead_paragraph: A study says that the breast cancer drug tamoxifen should be taken for 10 years rather than for the customary five years to help reduce the risk of death.

headline.seo: Extended Use of Breast Cancer Drug Suggested
headline.main: Bigger Role Seen for Breast Cancer Drug
headline.print_headline: Bigger Role Seen for Breast Cancer Drug
